TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpModuleCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

Docs.summary: Provides a way to index and retrieve a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Web.HttpModuleCollection.AllKeys%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.HttpModuleCollection.GetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpModuleCollection.CopyTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpModuleCollection> class. The example gets the application object for the current request from the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object. It then extracts the <xref:System.Web.HttpModuleCollection> object from the application instance and displays the names of the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets a string array containing all the keys (module names) in the .

.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Array dest, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the destination where copying starts.
Docs.summary: Copies members of the module collection to an , beginning at the specified index of the array.

remarks.format:

The example gets the application object for the current request from the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetKey(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: Index of the key to retrieve from the collection.
Docs.summary: Returns the key (name) of the object at the specified numerical index.
Docs.returns: The name of the member specified by the parameter.

remarks.format:

It then extracts the <xref:System.Web.HttpModuleCollection> object from the application instance and displays the names of the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule> objects.
